Steven Hassan

Steven Hassan once belonged to the Unification Church (a.k.a. Moonies) and worked constantly for two and a half years fundraising and recruiting for the group. Since that time he has become a mental health counselor and writer of several books on combating cults.

Within three months I was a cult leader. I got very deeply involved, and I got to the point where I was being told to think about what country I wanted to run when we took over the world.
